text: {{Infobox settlement | name = District of Viana do Castelo | native_name = | native_name_lang = pt | settlement_type = District | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_flag = Pt-vct1.gif | image_seal = | image_shield = VCT.png | image_map = LocalDistritoVianaDoCastelo.svg | map_caption = | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Portugal | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Norte | subdivision_type2 = Historical province | subdivision_name2 = Minho | subdivision_type3 = No. of municipalities | subdivision_name3 = 10 | subdivision_type4 = No. of parishes | subdivision_name4 = 290 | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Viana do Castelo | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 2,255 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 252011 | population_as_of = 2006 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = PT-16 | website = | footnotes = | blank_name_sec1 = No. of parliamentary representatives | blank_info_sec1 = 6 }} The District of Viana do Castelo () is in northwest Portugal. The district capital is the city of Viana do Castelo. == Municipalities == The district has 10 municipalities: * Arcos de Valdevez * Caminha * Melgaço * Monção * Paredes de Coura * Ponte da Barca * Ponte de Lima * Valença * Viana do Castelo * Vila Nova de Cerveira Category:Districts of Portugal
title: Viana do Castelo District
